name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.
skill_desc: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2%/3.9%/4.6%/5.3%/6% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.
